title: What are the best places in the US to live in for spirituality? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think whatever city you live in you can find people who are on their spiritual path. However, there are several cities I have found that the culture has embraced it on a daily basis. Boulder, COSedona, AZPortland, OregonTucson, AZSebastopol, CALaguna Beach, CASanta Cruz, CABend, OregonAshland, NCLilydale, NY
